# shouldAllow(_:with:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a Boolean value that determines whether spring-loaded interaction should begin or should continue for the specified context.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func shouldAllow(_ interaction: UISpringLoadedInteraction, with context: any UISpringLoadedInteractionContext) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **interaction**: The spring-loaded interaction requesting the information.
- **context**: An object that provides information about the current drag operation.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the spring-loaded interaction should begin or continue; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].
title: shouldAllow(_:with:)
